title: Lead Architect
description: Mature the platform for enterprise and partner integrations. Responsible for multi-tenant architecture and API governance.

tasks.title: Design Multi-Tenant Schema Extension
tasks.description: Architect and implement Firestore schema isolation patterns (collection-groups vs. sub-collections) to support 'Organization' level accounts for Insurers and Law Firms, ensuring strict data segregation.

tasks.title: Implement API Gateway Governance
tasks.description: Configure Google Cloud API Gateway to handle rate limiting, monetization tiers, and version control for the Partner API. Establish quota enforcements to prevent abuse.

tasks.title: Architect 'PROVENIQ ClaimsIQ' Data Clean Room
tasks.description: Design a secure, audit-logged environment using BigQuery Omni or similar tech for secure data exchange with insurers, minimizing PII exposure.

title: Compliance Officer
description: Ensure B2B compliance and advanced certification (SOC 2 Type II). Audits AI fairness for enterprise usage.

tasks.title: Conduct SOC 2 Type II Gap Analysis
tasks.description: Perform a comprehensive audit of current controls against SOC 2 Type II TSCs. Implement missing controls such as vendor risk management and incident response drills.

tasks.title: Draft Partner Code of Conduct
tasks.description: Create legally binding data usage agreements and ethical guidelines for third-party developers integrating with the Proveniq platform.

tasks.title: Establish Visual Truth Audit Cadence
tasks.description: Set up a recurring external audit schedule for 'Visual Truth' and valuation algorithms to satisfy insurer due diligence requirements.

title: Frontend Specialist
description: Build enterprise-grade interfaces and dashboards, including the Partner Portal and white-label tools.

tasks.title: Build Partner Portal Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop a secure React-based dashboard for partners to manage API keys, view usage analytics, and configure webhooks.

tasks.title: Implement Insurer Risk Visualizations
tasks.description: Create interactive D3.js or Recharts visualizations (heatmaps, scatter plots) allowing insurers to analyze risk exposure across their user base.

tasks.title: Create User Theme Builder
tasks.description: Develop a 'Theme Builder' UI engine that allows white-label partners to customize color palettes, typography, and logos.

title: Backend/DevOps Engineer
description: Scale infrastructure for B2B loads and reliability. Ensures 99.99% uptime SLA.

tasks.title: Deploy Isolated Enterprise Shards
tasks.description: Provision dedicated Cloud Functions and Firestore instances for high-volume enterprise partners to prevent 'noisy neighbor' performance degradation.

tasks.title: Implement High-Availability Failover
tasks.description: Configure multi-region database replication and automated failover mechanisms to guarantee 99.99% uptime for enterprise SLAs.

tasks.title: Build Bulk Ingestion Pipeline
tasks.description: Architect a high-throughput data pipeline using Pub/Sub and Dataflow for processing bulk inventory imports (e.g., millions of items) from partner systems.

title: QA Specialist
description: Validate B2B workflows and API integrity. Conducts load testing and validates tenant isolation.

tasks.title: Create Partner API Test Suite
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive automated test suite (Postman/Newman) validating all endpoints of the public Partner API.

tasks.title: Execute Tenant Isolation Penetration Tests
tasks.description: Run targeted security tests to attempt to access Data Tenant A from Data Tenant B's context, ensuring no cross-tenant leakage.

tasks.title: Simulate B2B High-Load Scenarios
tasks.description: Conduct stress tests simulating massive concurrent imports (1M+ items) to validate system stability under enterprise load.

title: Growth Engineer
description: Drive B2B adoption and ecosystem expansion through 'PROVENIQ Home for Business' and referral mechanics.

tasks.title: Develop B2B Landing Pages
tasks.description: Build high-conversion landing pages and lead capture forms for the 'PROVENIQ Home for Business' and 'PROVENIQ ClaimsIQ' enterprise offerings.

tasks.title: Analyze Partner-Driven Conversion
tasks.description: Implement tracking to measure the conversion rate of end-users invited via partner channels (e.g., insurer invitation emails).

tasks.title: Implement Revenue Share Attribution
tasks.description: Build backend logic to attribute subscriptions and value-add services to specific partners for automated revenue share calculation.

title: AI Safety Specialist
description: Ensure AI reliability in high-stakes B2B contexts. Audits claims processing and monitors for adversarial attacks.

tasks.title: Audit Automated Claims Logic
tasks.description: Review the decision-making pathways of the automated claims verification AI to identify and mitigate bias or incorrect denials.

tasks.title: Monitor B2B Model Fairness Metrics
tasks.description: Define and track fairness KPIs (Equal Opportunity Difference, Disparate Impact) for valuation models deployed to insurance partners.

tasks.title: Detect Model Extraction Attacks
tasks.description: Configure anomaly detection on API usage to identify patterns suggesting a partner or user is attempting to reverse-engineer the core model.

title: Data Scientist & Analytics Lead
description: Deliver actionable insights to enterprise partners via risk scoring and market trend analysis.

tasks.title: Develop Portfolio Risk Score Model
tasks.description: Create a statistical model to calculate a composite 'Risk Score' for insurers based on policyholder inventory data aggregation.

tasks.title: Generate Market Value Trend Reports
tasks.description: Automate the generation of quarterly reports analyzing depreciation/appreciation trends for key item categories (e.g., Electronics, Jewelry).

tasks.title: Build Partner Query Engine
tasks.description: Develop a secure, sandboxed interface allowing partners to run specific analytical queries on anonymized aggregate datasets.

title: Mobile Experience Architect
description: Enable partner-specific mobile experiences including deep linking, App Clips, and SDKs.

tasks.title: Implement Deep Linking Architecture
tasks.description: Configure Universal Links (iOS) and App Links (Android) to support seamless handoff from partner apps to specific inventory items.

tasks.title: Develop Instant App / App Clip
tasks.description: Build lightweight 'App Clip' and 'Instant App' binaries to allow users to scan items without a full application install.

tasks.title: Design PROVENIQ Home Mobile SDK
tasks.description: Architect a distributable mobile SDK allowing partners to embed PROVENIQ Home's scanning and valuation features directly into their own apps.

title: Strategic Partnerships Manager
description: Scale the partner ecosystem and revenue. Manages carrier deals and the developer marketplace.

tasks.title: Secure Carrier Partnership Agreements
tasks.description: Finalize negotiations and technical requirements for 'PROVENIQ ClaimsIQ' pilots with top-tier insurance carriers.

tasks.title: Launch Developer Marketplace
tasks.description: Oversee the go-to-market strategy for the Proveniq Developer Marketplace, including vetting and onboarding the initial cohort of 3rd party apps.

tasks.title: Structure Data Monetization Contracts
tasks.description: Draft and finalize contracts for selling anonymized industry insight packages to financial institutions.
